import{createClient}from'@supabase/supabase-js';// Initialize Supabase client
const supabaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL;const supabaseAnonKey=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY;const isDevelopment=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development';if(!supabaseUrl||!supabaseAnonKey){console.error('Missing Supabase credentials in .env file');}// In development mode, create a mock client if needed
let supabase;if(isDevelopment&&(!supabaseUrl||!supabaseAnonKey)){console.log('Using mock Supabase client for development');// Create a mock client with minimal implementation
supabase={auth:{getSession:async()=>({data:{session:null}}),getUser:async()=>({data:{user:null}}),onAuthStateChange:()=>({data:{subscription:{unsubscribe:()=>{}}}}),signIn:async()=>({data:null,error:null}),signOut:async()=>{}},from:()=>({select:()=>({eq:()=>({single:async()=>({data:null,error:null})})}),insert:async()=>({data:null,error:null}),update:async()=>({data:null,error:null})})};}else{// Create actual Supabase client
supabase=createClient(supabaseUrl,supabaseAnonKey);}export default supabase;
